### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity Generator at (x=-3.0, y=2.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (x=-3.0, y=2.5)
- Steam engine (x=0.5, y=2.5)
Connected by pipes and power poles

#### Oil Processing Facility
1. Crude Oil Extraction:
   - Pumpjack (x=17.5, y=40.5)
   - Connected to crude oil input tank (x=4.5, y=15.5)

2. Oil Refinery:
   - Oil refinery (x=9.5, y=15.5) set to Basic Oil Processing
   - Connected to:
     - Crude oil input tank (x=4.5, y=15.5)
     - Petroleum gas output tank (x=14.5, y=15.5) [currently missing]

3. Chemical Processing:
   - Chemical plant (x=2.5, y=8.5) set to Sulfur recipe
   - Petroleum gas input tank (x=-1.5, y=8.5) [currently missing]
   - Sulfur output tank (x=6.5, y=8.5)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Fluid Connection Issues
- Cannot connect chemical plants without first having the correct input fluid available (chemical plant expected petroleum gas but got crude oil)
- Verify fluid types match between connected entities before making connections
- Check fluid requirements of recipes before making connections

#### Entity Placement Errors
- Cannot place storage-tank at (14.5, 15.5) - position may be in water or blocked
- Move closer to target position before placing entities (max placement distance is 10 tiles)
- Verify target position is clear before attempting placement

#### Power Management
- Pumpjack stopped working due to NO_POWER status
- Ensure all electric entities are properly connected to power poles
- Monitor power production/consumption balance

#### Entity Status Checks
- Refinery has FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE - verify input connections and fluid availability
- Always check entity status before operations (WORKING vs other states)
- Storage tanks don't have .contents attribute - use appropriate methods to check fluids

#### Pipe Connection Problems
- Boiler to steam engine connection failed - verify connection points aren't blocked
- When reconnecting pipes, ensure both source and target connection points are accessible
- Remove old pipes completely before attempting new connections

#### General Tips
- Always check recipe requirements before setting up production chains
- Monitor entity status indicators to detect production issues
- Verify fluid systems are properly connected end-to-end before expecting production
